alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley; Daniels; Northern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:23PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Daniels, northwestern Roosevelt and northeastern Valley Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of St. Marie, or 21 miles southwest of Opheim, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Port Of Opheim, Peerless, Thoeny, Four Buttes, West Fork, Volt, Baylor, Glentana and Larslan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
